ValidationRule.description: For countries that have state (i.e. State = Country), then State should be null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name == 'EMAP Fuel Accounts', NOT(ISBLANK(BillingState)), OR( (BillingCountry = "Guam"), (BillingCountry = "New Zealand"), (BillingCountry = "Saipan"), (BillingCountry = "Singapore") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please remove Billing state, it is not required.
